items.summary: Update the React landing page styling to match the provided HTML snippet’s look and feel for the top navigation and hero section: keep the sticky white nav with a bold/underlined/italic brand title and an orange “Book Now” button, and update the hero section to use a blue diagonal gradient background (linear-gradient 135deg from #1e3a8a to #3b82f6) with centered heading and CTA buttons for WhatsApp and phone.

Replace all remaining Gujarati user-facing text in the landing page sections with clear English equivalents while keeping the meaning (at minimum: Services section heading and service descriptions; ensure the hero tagline is English).
